page.title: 05The Building Fund
page.content: For our new part of the{school}we need fifty thousand pounds.We already have eighteen thousand pounds.There already have been some fund raising events. One of the ideas were{bricks}that we could fill up with coppers and so when we fill up the bricks we are given the brick back but empty. We had{Americans over from Fort Worth,Texas.We had the Sheepdog trial where we raised Â£1000. In the{Horsham Arts Centre}there was a concert and the proceeds went to the Building Fund.Meanwhile in Headcorn, Kent two people volunteered to {parachute}from a plane to raise money for the Building Fund.The reason why Libby and Athen wanted to attempt this was not just because they wanted to jump it was so they could raise money for the{School Building Fund.
